title: Compartir
subtitle: Sharing
meta_desc: Learn about sharing in Spanish (compartir, juguetes, amable, generoso) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish sharing, compartir Spanish, share in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids
